content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Inserter Line at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner Inserter (position x=60.5, y=-61.5) and a Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
-  Burner Inserter (position x=61.5, y=-61.5) and a Wooden Chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5)
-  Burner Inserter (position x=62.5, y=-60.5)

### Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of an Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5) connected to a Pipe Group

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0) connected to a Pipe Group

### Generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5) connected to a Pipe Group and an Electric Pole

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserter is out of fuel
-  Ensure that the inserter has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when inserter output is blocked
-  Ensure that the output of the inserter is not blocked by items on the ground
-  Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output
### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
-  Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when generator has no input liquid
-  Ensure that the generator has a liquid input to operate
-  Ensure that the fluid connections are properly set up

# NAMESPACE
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter_1_position`: Position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
    *   `inserter_2_position`: Position(x=61.5, y=-61.5)
    *   `inserter_3_position`: Position(x=62.5, y=-60.5)
    *   `furnace_position`: Position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
    *   `offshore_pump_position`: Position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
    *   `boiler_position`: Position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
    *   `generator_position`: Position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
